bug.short_desc: [1.8][compiler] 'parameter cannot be resolved or is not a field' when using String concatenation

long_desc.thetext:
Thanks for the report.
This bug was fixed via bug 424710, the connection being:
The lambda expression was resolved more than once, but the SingleNameReference for r is not meant to be resolved more than once; at the second turn resolve will fall over its own result.
Regression test has been released via http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=a0e794820a3e45ac013c44e55b82e935802d5378
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 424710 ***
